name: Awesome Spark
body:
## Projects

- [awesome-spark](https://github.com/awesome-spark/awesome-spark) - A curated list of awesome Apache Spark packages and resources.
- [spark-gotchas](https://github.com/awesome-spark/spark-gotchas) - A collection of common problems with creating and maintaining Apache Spark applications.

## BOINC

- [World Community Grid Team]( http://www.worldcommunitygrid.org/team/viewTeamInfo.do?teamId=9NZNC0T172)
